query:
INSERT INTO blog_posts (title, slug, excerpt, category, tags, featured, read_time, published, created_at) VALUES
('How to Identify Real Factories vs Trading Companies in China', 'how-to-identify-real-factories', 'Learn the key differences between real factories and trading companies. Discover red flags and green flags that will help you make the right decision.', 'Supplier Verification', '["factories", "trading", "verification", "china"]', 1, 8, 1, NOW()),
('Top 10 Supplier Verification Tips That Save Money', 'top-10-supplier-verification-tips', 'Discover the most effective strategies used by professional sourcing agents to verify suppliers and avoid costly mistakes.', 'Tips & Tricks', '["verification", "tips", "suppliers", "sourcing"]', 1, 6, 1, NOW()),
('Red Flags That Indicate a Scam Supplier - Protect Your Investment', 'red-flags-scam-supplier', 'Learn how to identify warning signs of fraudulent suppliers before losing money. This comprehensive guide covers common scams and how to avoid them.', 'Supplier Verification', '["fraud", "scams", "protection", "verification"]', 0, 7, 1, NOW()),
('Secure Payment Methods for Importing from China - Protect Your Money', 'secure-payment-methods-china', 'Discover the safest payment methods when buying from Chinese suppliers. Learn about escrow, trade assurance, and payment protection strategies.', 'Payment & Finance', '["payment", "security", "escrow", "finance"]', 1, 9, 1, NOW()),
('Complete Guide to Shipping from China - Methods, Costs, and Timeline', 'complete-guide-shipping-china', 'Master the shipping process from Chinese factories. Learn about different shipping methods, costs, timelines, and how to track your shipment.', 'Shipping & Logistics', '["shipping", "logistics", "costs", "tracking"]', 1, 10, 1, NOW()),
('Quality Control Checklist for Factory Inspections', 'quality-control-checklist', 'A comprehensive checklist for inspecting factories and ensuring product quality. Learn what to look for and how to evaluate manufacturing standards.', 'Quality Assurance', '["quality", "inspection", "checklist", "standards"]', 0, 8, 1, NOW()),
('How to Negotiate Better Prices with Chinese Suppliers', 'negotiate-better-prices', 'Master the art of negotiation with Chinese suppliers. Learn strategies to get better prices without compromising on quality.', 'Tips & Tricks', '["negotiation", "pricing", "strategy", "suppliers"]', 0, 7, 1, NOW()),
('Building Long-Term Relationships with Suppliers', 'building-supplier-relationships', 'Learn how to establish trust and build long-term partnerships with your suppliers for mutual growth and success.', 'Business Strategy', '["relationships", "partnership", "trust", "business"]', 0, 6, 1, NOW());

logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 2: Unknown column 'read_time' in 'field list'
